mapper.insert: insert into sprint(sprint_id, sprint_title, sprint_color, sprint_start_date, sprint_end_date) values(sprint_seq.nextval, #{sprint_title}, #{sprint_color}, #{sprint_start_date}, #{sprint_end_date})
mapper.select: select sprint_id, sprint_title, sprint_color, project_id, To_CHAR(sprint_start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as sprint_start_date, TO_CHAR(sprint_end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as sprint_end_date from sprint order by sprint_start_date
